name: [PREORDER] RATCHET hoodie
description:
be the first to get RATCHET in these hoodies .


• Pre-order item: please allow a week and a half - two weeks for you item to be shipped off because pre-order items are not in stock until 1 week after the start date. 

• sizing: unisex sizes

• shipping: please allow 1.5-2 weeks for preorders, 3-7 business days for regular orders. Tracking numbers will be emailed.
• return/refund policy: No refunds. if the size does not fit you may email me for an address to send the product back. You have only 1 day after it is delivered to email me if you would like to exchange a size, then you have 5 business days to send off the item, if received more than 10 business days later, item will be sent back . If I receive the item and there are signs of wear, you will need to pay for return shipping via paypal to get the item sent back. Any sizing questions can be answered before purchasing, just contact us.

Thank you, be goods !
